name: Alejandro Paz-Lopez
content: Alejandro Paz López File. Department Computer Science and Information Technologies Knowledgment area Computational Science and Artificial Intelligence Research Research group Grupo Integrado de Ingeniería Research lines Robótica Educativa, Robótica Cognitiva, Computación Ubicua Teaching merits evaluation 1 five years period(s) Research merits evaluation 1 six years period(s) Contacto UDC directory Orcid id0000-0003-4952-7308 ResearcherIDR-5471-2018 Scopus24473195100 I am a Part-time Professor at the University of A Coruña, Spain. I received the M.S. degree in Computer Engineering from the University of A Coruña in 2002, and a PhD in Computer Science from the University of A Coruña in 2015. I am a member of the CITIC (Centre for Information and Communications Technology Research), www.citic-research.org﻿﻿. My main research activities are focused to ubiquitous computing and cognitive robotics. Since 2019 I am the software development team leader at MINT company, which commercializes the Robobo educational robot (theroboboproject.com﻿﻿﻿﻿).
